item.description:
Those of you who know me are aware that I work the band 'Black River Sound'. As it turns out, we are playing at Johnny D's in Davis square on the 22nd (http://www.johnnyds.c...) Well! it's friday night..so..why not meetup grab a few drinks, talk about snowboarding, make some weekend riding plans and listen to some really fantastic live music.
I noticed many new members in the group. It would be a great night for new members mixer. Let's take this opportunity to meet new shredders and make some plans for riding together this winter. This is a guaranteed fun night whether you ski, snowboard or just like to hangout.


The agenda:
Meetup at Johnny D's around 8-9pm with fellow shredders and get some drinks

Black River Sound will be teaming up with Emergency Service from New York City and rocking
the house for us from 10pm till midnight.

Afterparty at my house with the band members. Free beer and pizza. Listen to the new CD release of Black River Sound.


Black River Sound (Keep up with the Hendricks): The sound is as unique as the members of the band themselves. It's reggae, ripHop, ska, pop and R&B all somehow combined into one. Oh! 80% of the band is one family, the Hendricks. Keeping up withe Hendricks girls can be a challenge...when you meet them you will know.
http://www.myspace.co...
http://thephoenix.com...
http://www.weeklydig....
http://www.facebook.c...

Emergency Service (New York City):
http://www.myspace.co...
http://www.reverbnati...

Videos:
Julianna at her best @ Tammany Hall: http://www.youtube.co...
Deliver us: http://www.youtube.co...
Joey freestyle: http://www.youtube.co...
Steve Katsos show: http://www.youtube.co...


Hope to see you all at the show!
item.name: Fun night with snowboarders, Black River Sound and The Emergency Service
